poll_list.title: Ratification Poll for Facilitator Offboarding - RWF-001 (MIP41c5-SP12) - October 10, 2022

content.content: MIP41c5-SP12: Facilitator Offboarding (RWF-001)  Preamble MIP41c5-SP#: 12 Author(s): @ultraschuppi, @JustinCase  Contributors: @GFXlabs  Tags: core-unit, cu-rfw-001, facilitator, personnel-xboarding Status:  Obsolete Date Applied: 2022-08-18 Date Ratified: 2022-10-24 Forum URL: https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mip41c5-sp10-facilitator-offboarding-rwf-001/17332 Ratification Poll URL: https://vote.makerdao.com/polling/QmYgLJ1q Extra: This subproposal [passed](https://vote.makerdao.com/polling/QmRp4bDt), but so did the [Core Unit offboarding for RWF-001](https://github.com/makerdao/mips/blob/master/MIP39/MIP39c3-Subproposals/MIP39c3-SP5.md), which upon passing was to take precedence over it, as stated further down in this subproposal.   Sentence Summary This subproposal offboards the current Facilitator of the Real World Finance Core Unit (RWF-001).  Specification This subproposal relieves the current RWF-001 Facilitator, @williamr, from his responsibilities as a mandated actor and leader of the RWF-001 Core Unit. The outgoing Facilitator will not be considered a member of the RWF-001 Core Unit unless retained by the Interim or a future Facilitator. All unspent funds and assets should immediately be handed over to an appointed Interim Facilitator. If this proposal passes and MIP39c3-SP5 passes at the same time, the other one should take precedence over and supersede this one.  Motivation @williamr is actively divesting the RWF-001 of its duties, and appears to have abandoned his mandate to other Core Units. As the mandate is currently not being fulfilled, an alternative path is required to ensure the protocol meets obligations to external stakeholders. This subproposal is meant to be held as an option to MKR holders, if RWF-001 is not rehabilitated and actively pursuing its mandate by the time this subproposal is eligible for submission. It is preferable to see a tangible plan articulated and executed by @williamr.  Core Unit ID RWF-001
content.GPT-summary: The post is a subproposal that offboards the current Facilitator of the Real World Finance Core Unit (RWF-001). The proposal explains the details of the offboarding process and the motivation behind it. The post also includes information about the status, tags, and contributors of the proposal. The proposal is obsolete and has already passed, but the post provides links to related proposals that have also passed. The post does not advertise the proposal, ask for collaboration, or ask questions about the proposal.

content.content: This is a summary of the potential impact of this proposal, from GovAlpha’s perspective:  This is a valid Facilitator offboarding subproposal under the currently approved governance process. This proposal aims to offboard @williamr as the Facilitator of the Real-World Finance Core Unit (RWF-001). If the proposal is ratified, @williamr will no longer be RWF-001’s Facilitator. If this proposal is ratified, an Interim Facilitator should be appointed. This proposal has been assigned High-Impact based on the methodology listed here.

content.content: The @Llama delegation believes that the proposed MIP comes at the right moment. Although it is premature to have an opinion regarding the MIP, it has become evident that a holistic conversation about the future of the RWF program is needed. We hope that such holistic conversation would consider the:   Need for continuous monitoring of existing RWA-related vaults, that are now in way larger size than before Opportunity to complete ongoing processes  Opportunity to draft a revamped mandate for the RWF-001 CU, and for any RWF-related programs  We look forward to engage on the matter. Regards, Luca

content.content: ultraschuppi:  This sub proposal is meant to be held as an option to MKR holders if RWF-001 is not rehabilitated and actively pursuing its mandate by the time this subproposal is eligible for submission.   So is this being proposed as some type of contingency plan?
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party asking questions about proposal

content.content: Our team at Flipside recognizes this as a critical time for the DAO to assess the trajectory of RWF-001 CU It is clear we’ve faced uncertainty and heightened risk around the program as of late, which has begun to impact the potential for future RWA applicants & lenders to get involved. We are prioritizing business continuity and damage mitigation, and encourage the DAO to examine this proposal along the lines of potential impediments facing RWF’s long-term viability now. As of now RWAs are a cornerstone of MakerDAO’s future growth - until other plans are agreed upon, we should all be open to discussing what it will take to make sure we service our partners as best we can.
